pages.text: $(item)感知之劍$()是把比$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/soul_snare)靈魂投網$()能更有效蒐集$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/demon_will)惡魔意志$()的武器；雖然它第一眼可能看上去很弱，不過它是能夠透過你道具中擁有的意志來增強的，所以合成幾顆$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/soul_gem)地獄魂石$()是必需的。$(br2)還有記得，那把劍跟所有的$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/sentient_tools)感知工具$()一樣，都是可在鐵砧中用$(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/crystallized_will)意志晶體$()去修復的。

pages.heading: 感知之劍
pages.text: This sword will serve you well.$(br2)Note that you can update the sword's stats by pressing [$(k:use)] when you have it equipped - if you have recently acquired a large amount of $(raw)Will$(), or perhaps are trying out a new Aspect of Will for the first time, then this may be a good idea.
